title: Meet Me in the Ether
description: What happens when a beautiful liar, a cruel prince, a ruthless manipulator, a seductive enchantress, and a man who is willing to do whatever it takes to find the woman he loves get tangled in the same web of lies and secrets?Neira Aroya is an exceptional liar and a skilled thief. Ignorant of her true identity, she relies on her mortal gifts to survive in a world ruled by vicious faeries and cunning gods. But as she gets swept up by the peculiar power she holds over the ether, the mysterious Realm of dreams, she finds herself torn between an unnamed, obscured etherman and the merciless Prince of Fae.Entrapped within a tempting but deceptive world, she will soon realize that every hero is a villain, and every villain bears a great tragedy. And love is the most dangerous and unreliable path to follow.Meet Me in the Ether is an intricate story full of complex characters, set in a dark world where love and hate converge, truth is poison, and virtue becomes nothing more than a sacrifice on the altar of survival.
author: Iris Lake
